column5: I too have booked a late aug trip with eddie. This river system looks awesome. There will not be enough daylight to cover it all. After talking to eddie, telling him what our group was looking for, i booked. He is wants to make sure that all guests have a good time. I have been to camps where they take your money and say go have at it. He is in camp all week with us, which on a fly in is like having a guide right there. Looking forward to a great week in a beautiful area.
